trans-unit.source: Defines a common set of properties for the several display modes that a Web Parts page can enter.
trans-unit.target: 为 Web 部件页可以进入的若干种显示模式定义一组公用属性。

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts page can enter several different display modes.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件页可以输入多个不同的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: In each display mode, certain elements of the Web Parts user interface (UI) are either hidden or displayed, and certain kinds of user modifications to a page are either enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在每个显示模式下，某些元素的 Web 部件用户界面 (UI) 或隐藏或显示，和某些类型的到页上的用户修改是 enabled 或 disabled。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control contains the implementation for the display modes that are available in the Web Parts control set, and manages the display modes for a page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件包含可用于 Web 部件控件集，显示模式的实现并管理页的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists fields that represent the available display modes.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出字段表示可用的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Display mode
trans-unit.target: 显示模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Displays Web Parts controls and UI elements in the normal mode in which end users view a page.
trans-unit.target: 在正常模式下在其中最终用户查看页面中显示 Web 部件控件和 UI 元素。

trans-unit.source: Displays zone UI elements and enables users to drag Web Parts controls to change the layout of a page.
trans-unit.target: 显示区域 UI 元素，并使用户能够将 Web 部件控件，若要更改页的布局。

trans-unit.source: Displays special editing UI elements and enables end users to edit the controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: 显示特殊编辑 UI 元素，并使最终用户能够编辑页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: Displays special catalog UI elements and enables end users to add and remove page controls.
trans-unit.target: 显示特殊目录 UI 元素，并使最终用户能够添加和删除页面控件。

trans-unit.source: Displays special connections UI elements and enables end users to connect Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 显示特殊的连接 UI 元素，并使最终用户能够连接 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code examples demonstrate the declarative use of display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示在 Web 部件页面上的显示模式以声明方式使用。

trans-unit.source: Each of these display modes, as implemented by the Web Parts control set, is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class.
trans-unit.target: 其中每个显示模式下，Web 部件控件集的实施方式，派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>类。

trans-unit.source: This code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例包含四个部分：

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: A Web page with a zone to host the custom control.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含为不同区域承载自定义控件的网页。

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables users to change display modes on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用户能够更改用户控件在网页上显示模式。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the page works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 关于页在浏览器中的工作方式的说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the example is a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, `TextDisplayWebPart`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第一部分是一个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: For a demonstration of both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关这两种编译方法的演示，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is a Web page that references a standard ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control within an `<asp:webpartzone>` element, so that the control is wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control and given basic Web Parts functionality at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分是引用标准 ASP.NET 网页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件中`<asp:webpartzone>`元素，以便与包装控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件和在运行时提供基本的 Web 部件功能。

trans-unit.source: The page also references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control within an `<asp:catalogzone>` element, which demonstrates the end user's ability to switch to catalog mode and add controls to the page.
trans-unit.target: 该页还引用`TextDisplayWebPart`控件中`<asp:catalogzone>`元素，其演示了最终用户能够切换到目录模式并将控件添加到页。

trans-unit.source: The page also includes an `<asp:editorzone>` element, which enables users to edit the controls contained in the `<asp:webpartzone>` when the page is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 该页面还包括`<asp:editorzone>`元素，它使用户能够编辑中包含的控件`<asp:webpartzone>`当页面处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Near the top of the page are a `register` directive for the custom control and another one for the user control.
trans-unit.target: 页面顶部附近是`register`针对自定义控件，另一个用于用户控件的指令。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is a user control that enables users to switch display modes on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第三部分是使用户能够切换显示模式在网页上一个用户控件。

trans-unit.source: Save the source code for this control in a file named DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx or DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx (depending on which language you use for the code example), and put it in the same directory as the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 将此控件的源代码保存在一个名为 DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx 或 DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx （具体取决于哪种语言使用的代码示例），文件并将其置于网页所在的目录。

trans-unit.source: For more details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see the topic [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见主题[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: When you load the page in a browser, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to different display modes.
trans-unit.target: 当加载浏览器中时，你可以使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以切换到不同的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: To edit controls, select **Edit** in the drop-down list control.
trans-unit.target: 若要编辑控件，选择**编辑**下拉列表控件中。

trans-unit.source: To edit a specific control, expose its verbs menu by clicking the arrow in the control's title bar, and then clicking **Edit** in the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 若要编辑特定控件，通过单击控件的标题栏中的箭头，然后单击公开其谓词菜单**编辑**谓词菜单中。

trans-unit.source: When a control is in edit mode, the editing controls added to this page enable you to change the edited control's appearance and layout.
trans-unit.target: 当控件处于编辑模式时，则添加到此页的编辑控件，可以更改编辑的控件的外观和布局。

trans-unit.source: When you are finished, select **Browse** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to a normal view.
trans-unit.target: 在完成后，请选择**浏览**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以将页返回到普通视图。

trans-unit.source: To add controls to the page, switch to catalog mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要将控件添加到页面中，切换到目录模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that you can either use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, or click the button near the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: 请注意你可以使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，或单击页面底部附近的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The inline code for the `Button1_Click` method demonstrates how to change display modes programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 内联代码`Button1_Click`方法演示如何以编程方式更改显示模式。

trans-unit.source: While you are in catalog mode, you can add the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 当你在目录模式下，你可以添加自定义`TextDisplayWebPart`到页面的控件。

trans-unit.source: Developers can derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> class to create custom display modes.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以派生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" />类，以创建自定义显示模式。

trans-unit.source: To make a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> available on a Web Parts page, you would also need to derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class, and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使自定义<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" />可在 Web 部件页面上，你还需要派生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />类，并重写其<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes" />方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the display mode.
trans-unit.target: 显示模式的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a value for the name of the display mode.
trans-unit.target: 为显示模式的名称初始化一个值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object is never created because the class is abstract.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>永远不会创建对象，因为类为抽象类。

trans-unit.source: At run time, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class as the base class to create objects for each of the various page display modes.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>类作为基类，来创建对象的每个不同的页面显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If you derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> class to create a custom display mode, in your class declaration you must call the base constructor and pass to it a string containing the name of the custom display mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" />类，以创建自定义显示模式中，你必须调用基构造函数，并将包含自定义显示模式的名称的字符串传递给它的类声明中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether users can change the layout of a Web Parts page when the page is in a certain display mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定当一个 Web 部件页处于某种特定显示模式时，用户是否能够更改页面布局。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if users can change the page layout; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户可以更改页面布局，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a certain display mode is associated with a class that derives from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示某种显示模式是否与一个从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone" /> 类中派生的类关联。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the display mode is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone" /> class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示模式与一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone" /> 类关联，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts page enters a display mode whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode.AssociatedWithToolZone%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control interprets that to mean that an associated class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class, and that additional user interface (UI) elements need to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 部件页进入的显示模式其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode.AssociatedWithToolZone%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件将解释，表示关联的类派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>类，并且该附加用户界面 (UI) 元素要显示的需要。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a page enters edit mode, special zones that contain UI elements for editing Web Parts controls appear on the page.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当一个页进入编辑模式，在页上将显示特殊区域，其中包含用于编辑 Web 部件控件的 UI 元素。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is made possible because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode.AssociatedWithToolZone%2A> property value on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> field is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此行为进行可能因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode.AssociatedWithToolZone%2A>上的属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>字段设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> base class to create custom display modes must override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode.AssociatedWithToolZone" /> property in order to set its value.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" />基类来创建自定义显示模式必须重写<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode.AssociatedWithToolZone" />属性，以便将其值设置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control instance on the current page.
trans-unit.target: 当前页面上的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether users can personalize a page while the page is in a certain display mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当一个页面处于某种显示模式时，用户是否可以对页面进行个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if users can personalize a page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户可以对页面进行个性化设置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: However, when <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode.RequiresPersonalization" /> is set to <see langword="true" />, and personalization is disabled on the page, the default will be <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 不过，如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode.RequiresPersonalization" /> 设置为 <see langword="true" />，而且在页面上禁用个性化设置，默认值将会是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of a display mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取显示模式的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of a display mode.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含显示模式的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a particular display mode requires personalization to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示某种显示模式是否求启用个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether personalization is required.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示是否需要进行个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether controls that have their <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden" /> property set to <see langword="true" /> should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否应显示其 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" /> 的控件。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether hidden controls should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示是否应显示隐藏的控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。
